subject: PLSH
title: Beginning Polish
info: Develop basic proficiency in listening, speaking, reading, and writing and become acquainted with Polish culture. First of four courses designed to satisfy CLA language graduation requirement.

subject: PLSH
title: Intermediate Polish
info:

info: Reading and analysis of major works of Polish literature from 1863 to the present.
